p: Ribavirin is an antiviral compound. It works as a guanosine analogue and usually in combination with IFN (α, β). Preclinical studies with Ribavirin have shown promise, but clinical data in the treatment of MERS-CoV epidemic was conflicting. Interferons (α, β), however, demonstrated positive action against MERS-CoV [ 7, 26]. Clinical data regarding this combination in the treatment of COVID-19 patients is still lacking, but several clinical trials are currently being conducted [ 38, 69].
